## Prerequisites Check

Before starting, ensure you have:

```bash
# Check required tools
which <tool1>
which <tool2>

# Verify previous lab artifacts
ls -la ~/path/to/previous/lab/output
```

---

## Setup

### Workspace Preparation

```bash
# Create lab directory
mkdir -p ~/embedded-linux-labs/labX-topic
cd ~/embedded-linux-labs/labX-topic

# Set environment variables
export LAB_DIR=$PWD
export CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-
export ARCH=arm64
```

### Required Packages

```bash
# Install necessary packages
sudo apt update
sudo apt install \
    package1 \
    package2 \
    package3
```
